channel.title: Remix a sad song into a really fun one!
channel.description: Hey guys! So I’m still kinda new to Auxy but I wanted to do a contest because it looks really fun! So I decided that it would be cool to see if you guys can remix my song, Please Don’t Let These Tears Fall Again. It’s currently a sad/chill song and I think it’d be cool to see it remixes into an upbeat dance song or something else. If you’re interested then just reply to the thread thxxxx^^

item.title: Remix a sad song into a really fun one!
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
I totally forgot to put in a cut off date, I don’t know how long it takes to make a remix so for now I’ll set the cutoff date for September 17 (you can submit before then though) and anyone who needs more time can just say so before the day of. Thx guys!

Read full topic

item.source: Remix a sad song into a really fun one!

item.title: Remix a sad song into a really fun one!
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
Yay I’m happy you guys are interested! I have say though I don’t have any rewards but if you want I can repost the winners remix and another track of their choice (I don’t have many followers though)

Here’s the link, feel free to do anything you want, go crazyXD
https://app.auxy.co/projects/u3ad_AgZb9JEAkYFPqk7Tw==

If you choose to upload your remix please give me partial credit, thank you^^ if you have nah questions feel free to ask!

Read full topic
